name: Of Sins and Curses
description:
Team 2-D presents you a tale of how a jester saved his kingdom from a terrible curse.

Once upon a time, there was a jester who was secretly seeing the youngest of the eight princesses.
One day the king got very sick and everyone knew that his days were numbered.
But when he tried to marry his oldest daughter to a prince to secure the next heir, all princesses were smitten by a terrible curse. Yet no one knew what the curse was nor what it does. All they knew was that it grows bigger and bigger every day.
So on the third day of the curse the king proclaimed a bounty to whoever finds the malefactor. 

Information:

-This game was made for a 48-hour Game Jam (Manasoup).
-Currently, it is in German only, but we probably will add English to it later.
-It is not quite finished, but we have a lot that hopefully will satisfy you.
-We will add the rest of the story later.
